title: 有馬記念の後に・勝利の後の腹ごなし

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser, who defeated Nice Nature in the 'Arima Kinen'! After the race, the two headed to—
A ramen shop. Nice Nature was dejected by the defeat, but the news playing in the shop praised her as having a good run—
Imitating Matikanetannhauser's 'next time for sure,' she looks forward. The two slurped their noodles together, preparing for the next battle.
